An aerial image of a majestic building has been shared on social media with the claim that it is a government school in Dwarka, Delhi. “Yeh 5 star Hotel nahi hai Delhi government School hai,” reads the accompanying message.
The photograph has been shared by several individuals on Facebook.

A reverse image search on Google reveals that the photograph is of Chhindwara Institute of Medical Sciences in Madhya Pradesh. CMO MP had tweeted the same image in February 28 when the hospital was inaugurated.

Today Chief Minister Shri Kamal Nath will also inaugurate Chhindwara Medical College. During his Chhindwara visit HCM will Inaugurate and lay foundation stone of different development projects costing over 1944 Crore rupee.@MOHedump @JansamparkMP @dmchhindwara @prochhindwara pic.twitter.com/Z0sCLO8md9
The same image also adorns the home page of the institute’s website.
An image of a government medical college in Chhindwara, Madhya Pradesh was shared as a government school in Delhi.
Pooja Chaudhuri is a senior editor at Alt News.
